summary: Better familiars that level up with you! New familiars that increase your power while summoned! Familiars aren\'t just for Mages anymore!
descriptionHtml:
------------------*NOTICE 2-11-12*--------------------------------------------

Alright. A bunch of people have been asking;

When is this mod going to be done?,
Why don\'t you have 60 second Familiar summons?
What are you planing on doing with this mod?

So im answering these three very important questions now, here on the front page, for all to see:

1. Going to be done? Honestly? no idea. I have so many ideas for this thing I don\'t know were to begin let alone end.

2. 60 second familiars. Maybe its the D&D or all the many, many, fantasy novels I\'ve read but, to me, familiars were never meant to be summoned for 60-seconds, deal some damage, then die. A familiar is a creature you\'ve bound from the Atral/void/dimensional/whatever zone to serve as a companion and guardian on your journeys. Not a cast and forget damage spell. There not spells. There Familiars.

3.What am I going to do with this mod? This one is a bit hard. I guess I will just start with the features coming in the next update(which probably wont be for a few days as you\'ll see) and go from there.

Only a few familiars will be available at shops. A beginners set if you will. Small bonuses, no major abilities, standard effects, that sort of stuff.

The rest of the familiars, the unique and powerful ones, will be drops from the various creatures around skyrim giving you the option of hunting down powerful, useful, unique, familiars and providing an actual reason to kill that bear or take down those wolves, apart from the-\"well it attacked me first\". and really just keeping things interesting.

Some quests will also give you a unique familiar on completion of (or to be used to help you complete) a quest. For instance: You joined the Dark Brotherhood and, as a token of appreciation for a quest well done, Astrid rewards you with a unique Shadow Spider familiar to aid you on your dark path.

Already did some of the Dark Brotherhood quests? Well maybe if you kill there pet spider you can claim its soul as unique familiar.

Just an example.

Eventually I would like to make a whole new College focusing on the different paths of the familiar with unique story lines and quest chains for each \"class\"(and yes, new perk trees) but that\'s out of my skill level and time allowance for now. I might even have to release that as another mod altogether. will see.


So there you have it. mostly. This will eventually be a very large mod that will add a whole new path to choose. Consider this mod in public Beta testing for the time being. Expect a big update in a few days with a lot more variety.

Than you all (and especially those of you who actually read all that text up there) for you continued support and comments.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

 

Familiars are not just for Mage\'s anymore!

- Big two-handed, heavy armor wearing brute? Summon the mighty Bear!

- Stealthy Rogue? Summon the sneaky Skeever!

- One-handed and Magic?? No problem! Summon the Wolf of the Flame!

- or *gasp* an actual Mage?! Summon a Magical Anomaly and show them a true mages Familiar!

A Familiar for every occasion(well...almost), available now at your local Riverwood Trader Co.!


All new Familiar spells are available at the Riverwood Trader and from Phinis Gestor at the college. for now. Big plans are in the works for this mod so stay tuned!

Features:
-Stronger familiars that level up with you!
-New familiars to choose from (more coming soon!)
-Duration options in 24hr, 6min, and 60sec (for Wolf and Wolf of the Flame only)
-Gain bonuses depending on the Familiar you use!
-and yes they can follow you everywhere! even through doors!

to many exclamation points?! NEVER!!! ok maybe...its been a long day....

 

Upcoming/In-development:
-more familiars
-familiars that can use spells (passive spells do work and the Wolf of the Flame has a fire resistance bonus)
-new sound effects
-temporary perk boosts
-and whatever else you guys can think of let me know!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-Familiars can now follow you through doors!
